info.title: Slack Chat API
info.description: The API for management Slack Chats

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel containing the message to be deleted.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: chat:write:user)

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to be deleted.

get.summary: Sends a message to a channel.
get.description: Sends a message to a channel.

parameters.name: as_user
parameters.description: Pass true to post the message as the authed user, instead of as a bot

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Structured message attachments.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name. See below for more details.

parameters.name: icon_emoji
parameters.description: emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.

parameters.name: icon_url
parameters.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message

parameters.name: link_names
parameters.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

parameters.name: parse
parameters.description: Change how messages are treated. See below.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: chat:write:bot or chat:write:user)

parameters.name: unfurl_links
parameters.description: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

parameters.name: unfurl_media
parameters.description: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Name of bot.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Structured message attachments.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel containing the message to be updated.

parameters.name: link_names
parameters.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

parameters.name: parse
parameters.description: Change how messages are treated. See below.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: New text for the message, using the default formatting rules.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: chat:write:user)

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: Timestamp of the message to be updated.
